title: FDE FileVault Options (com.apple.MCX)
description: The payload that configures FileVault options.

dontAllowFDEDisable.title: Prevent Disabling FileVault
dontAllowFDEDisable.description: If 'true', the system won't disable FileVault.

dontAllowFDEEnable.title: Prevent Enabling FileVault
dontAllowFDEEnable.description: If 'true', the system won't enable FileVault.

DestroyFVKeyOnStandby.title: Prevent Storing Temporary FileVault Key for Standby
DestroyFVKeyOnStandby.description: If 'true', the system won't store th FileVault key across restarts.
